list.abs: ...学院院长，开始正式采用于法学院契约法课程，直接以判例书籍(cases book)为课程教材，又称为「判例书方法」(casebook method)。并于课堂教室以问答式(the question-and-answer technique)，由教师.
·《电子商务管理:课文和案例》 (美)克里希纳默西李北平等北京大学出版社 2005年3月 ￥45元 ·《电子商务案例(E-Commerce casebook)——毅伟商学院经典.

entry.tran: (医生的)病例记录;(社会工作者的)个案记录;(警察的)案卷
entry.def: A casebook is a written record of the cases dealt with by someone such as a doctor, social worker, or police officer.

means.word_mean: 1. a book in which detailed written records of a case are kept and which are a source of information for subsequent work
1. according to or characteristic of a casebook or textbook; typical;
